problem.markdown:
Use a Venn diagram to test the argument below for validity.
No logicians are musicians. All musicians are artists. Consequently, no artists are logicians.
>>According to the Venn diagram, is this argument valid or invalid?<<
( ) Valid
(x) Invalid

multiplechoiceresponse.p: Use a Venn diagram to test the argument below for validity.
No logicians are musicians. All musicians are artists. Consequently, no artists are logicians.
